data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 2, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Fulham's half.
John McGinn (Aston Villa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 4, Goal! Jack Grealish gives Aston Villa a 0-1 lead.
Great play from John McGinn to set up the goal.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 8, Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 11, Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Fulham's Bobby Reid has been booked in London.
Matt Targett (Aston Villa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fulham push upfield and Aleksandar Mitrovic gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Aston Villa defence.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
Aston Villa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Aleksandar Mitrovic's header is off-target for Fulham.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Conor Hourihane puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 15, John McGinn instrumental with a fine assist.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Stuart Attwell awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aleksandar Mitrovic (Fulham) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Fulham.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Tom Cairney is booked for the home team.
In the minute 24, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 25, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Jack Grealish returns to the field for Aston Villa after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 28, Attention is being given to Aston Villaâ€™s Jack Grealish and play has been suspended briefly.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
In the minute 31, Throw-in Aston Villa.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Craven Cottage.
Fulham are coming forward and Ivan Cavaleiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, Stuart Attwell awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Fulham have a goal kick.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Stuart Attwell waits before resuming play because Kenny Tete for Fulham is still down.
In the minute 39, Scott Parker (Fulham) has taken off Kenny Tete who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Aboubakar Kamara is the replacement.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 44, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Fulham.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Conor Hourihane (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In London, Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Joe Bryan (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Stuart Attwell.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 46, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ollie Watkins.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In the minute 47, At Craven Cottage, Denis Odoi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 48, Aston Villaâ€™s Ollie Watkins is on his feet again at Craven Cottage.
Great finish from Tyrone Mings to give Aston Villa a 0-3 lead.
Conor Hourihane with an assist there.
Stuart Attwell signals a Fulham throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Aston Villa.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Aston Villa.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a second substitution, with Maxime Le Marchand replacing Michael Hector.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, John McGinn for Aston Villa has been booked by Stuart Attwell and receives a first yellow card.
Fulham's Aleksandar Mitrovic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Stuart Attwell awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ollie Watkins for Aston Villa is whistled offside.
Stuart Attwell signals a Fulham throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
In the minute 62, Aleksandar Mitrovic (Fulham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Craven Cottage.
Bobby Reid (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Aleksandar Mitrovic (Fulham) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 66, Aston Villa's Jack Grealish attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Fulham drive upfield and Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
In the minute 68, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Maxime Le Marchand (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
Fulham's Joe Bryan breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Aston Villa's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Conor Hourihane with Jacob Ramsey. This is the first substitution made today by Dean Smith.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Scott Parker is making the team's third substitution at Craven Cottage with Neeskens Kebano replacing Bobby Reid.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Fulham.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Can Aston Villa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 83, Aston Villa drive upfield and Trezeguet gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell awards Fulham a goal kick.
Neeskens Kebano (Fulham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Bertrand Traore is replacing Trezeguet for Aston Villa at Craven Cottage.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aston Villa's half?
In the minute 85, Fulham needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Aston Villa!
Tyrone Mings (Aston Villa) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa's Tyrone Mings has run offside.
In the minute 87, The away team have replaced Douglas Luiz with Marvelous Nakamba. This is the third substitution made today by Dean Smith.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Fulham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Joe Bryan for Fulham drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Fulham just outside Aston Villa's area.
Fulham push forward at Craven Cottage and Tom Cairney gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aston Villa defence.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Fulham.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Stuart Attwell blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
Aboubakar Kamara (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
Tyrone Mings (Aston Villa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
